Posts.Title: Hi everyone

Posts.Content: I only just been diagnosed on the 8th march with breast cancer and iam having my breast removed . i feel i cant cope been crying  all the time , is this normal , i have really lost my mojo as i like to call it , please teel me how you all felt or feel , as i feel like iam alone thanks x
